summary: This Health Care Capsule summarizes our extensive work on nursing homes, including our assessments of the quality of care, COVID-19 response, consumer information concerns, and more. The pandemic brought into sharper focus problems with nursing home quality that we have long highlighted, such as persistent infection control challenges. We have recommended, among other things, that the government provide consumers with more information on care quality—such...
title: Health Care Capsule: Improving Nursing Home Quality and Information
